full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'BRUM BDAG LHA MO SHE TA LA'I MNGON RTOGS DANG LHA BEG GNYIS KYI GTOR 'BUL 'PHRIN BCOL MDOR BSDUS DANG 'BRUM BDAG LHA MO SHE TA LA'I SGO NAS 'BRUM NAD MYUR DU CHAD PA DANG 'BRUM NAG DKAR BOR 'BYUNG BA'I MAN NGAG DANG BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
